      • setupStrokePaint

        protected boolean setupStrokePaint(android.graphics.Paint paint,
                                   float opacity)
        Sets up #mPaint according to the props set on a shadow view. Returns true if the stroke should be drawn, false if not.

      • setupFillPaint

        protected boolean setupFillPaint(android.graphics.Paint paint,
                                 float opacity)
        Sets up #mPaint according to the props set on a shadow view. Returns true if the fill should be drawn, false if not.
